home.email_body: Hey Lucas! Let's exchange some ideas about...

p1.title: Who Am I?
p1.text: I'm a developer certified in Human Code by 42 SÃ£o Paulo, passionate about learning and sharing knowledge in the field of development.

p2.title: What I'm Currently Doing?
p2.text: Currently, I'm working as a junior developer at Gigage, where I have the opportunity to grow and contribute to challenging projects.

p3.title: My Studies and Interests
p3.text: I'm focused on enhancing my skills in web development, dedicating time to studying both front-end and back-end to become a more well-rounded and effective professional.

frontend.title: Front-end
frontend.text: I have experience with front-end development, working with Nuxt and Tailwind. I'm also studying Next.js and Svelte.

backend.title: Back-end
backend.text: I'm studying back-end development with Django and FastAPI. I'm also studying Python and C/C++.

other.title: Tools and Other Skills
other.text: I have experience with DevOps, working with Git and Docker.

blog.title: Log of dev - my personal blog
blog.description: log of dev is a project that I started to share experiences and knowledge in the world of development, I hope you like it and that it is useful to you.
